title: Client Problems
body: 1. So I log on to my account and I try Draft mode but the screen is stuck there so I try Blind Pick but when I go to Blind Pick and into champion select the screen is still black? What do I do?

replies.body:
These are common symptoms of a poor or unstable connection to our servers. Your connection can be impacted by certain network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to eliminate this possibility.

Please let me know if you continue to experience these issues after you've taken the steps in that guide.
